title: Gorgeously renovated 3-bed 2-bath. Near Juniper Valley Park
posting_body: ['Gorgeously renovated 3-bedroom 2-bathroom apartment.', 'This super bright unit with hardwood floors throughout, great closets  and comfortable layout is to be enjoyed by the most discerning tenant.', 'Real home with oversized living room and spacious dining area situated between the open kitchen and the living room.', 'Large windowed kitchen with pretty ample cabinetry and  marble counertops.', 'Fully boxed light filled spacious bedrooms.', 'Both bathrooms are renovated, spacious and have good quality finishes.', 'Well maintained private house on a serene tree lined block.', 'Highly coveted location in prime Middle Village , walking distance to the Juniper Valley Park as well as to the M train station on Metropolitan Avenue and multiple bus lines.', 'Nearby neighborhoods offer numerous excellent schools and all neighborhood amenities needed for easy daily living.', ' Quick ride to several highways, major retailers, department stores, malls, restaurants and more.', 'Please inquire for additional details.', 'If you  are interested in this apartment or any of my other strictly exclusive Astoria, Ridgewood, Bushwick, Glendale, and Middle Village listings, please register your inquiry by replying to this post.', 'Please feel free to provide any information you consider pertinent to your search.', 'Ridgewood Based Independent Broker.', 'Representing strictly hands on local owners of small buildings and houses.', 'No large buildings or impersonal managements.', 'Andrea Bohackova', 'Licensed Real Estate Broker', 'Sales Rentals Property Management', 'Manhattan Queens Brooklyn', '917-291-2149', '<URL>', '<URL>', 'Andrea Bohackova Licensed Real Estate Broker does Business in Accordance With the Federal Fair Housing Law.', 'All information furnished herein is from sources deemed reliable.', 'No representation is made by Andrea Bohackova Licensed Real Estate Broker nor is any to be implied as to the accuracy thereof and all information is submitted subject to errors, omissions, change of price, prior sale or lease, or withdrawal without notice.', 'All dimensions are approximate.', 'For exact dimensions, please hire your own architect or engineer.', 'Regarding Leasing Only: Applicants Must Demonstrate their ability to pay rent either through employment or other means.']
